alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 2:03PM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow and strong winds expected above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Winds gusting from 50 to 60 mph will cause blizzard like conditions, regardless of snowfall accumulations. * WHERE...Areas above 5000 feet near Payson and Pine-Strawberry. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 11 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow with blizzard like conditions are likely. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage and power outages. Snow forecast from 2 AM Wednesday to 11 PM Wednesday: Payson 3 to 5 inches Pine-Strawberry 5 to 9 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
